animals.name: Eagle
animals.funFact: Eagles have excellent eyesight and can detect prey up to two miles away.

animals.name: Parrot
animals.funFact: Parrots are intelligent birds capable of learning many words and phrases.

animals.name: Flamingo
animals.funFact: Flamingos are famous for their bright pink feathers and stilt-like legs.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.funFact: Penguins are flightless birds that live almost exclusively in the Southern Hemisphere.

animals.name: Owl
animals.funFact: Owls are known for their silent flight and distinctive hooting calls.
